Policies and Initiatives.title: AI-system to challan vehicles sans valid docus at Goa border checkposts
Policies and Initiatives.summary: The GoVA system uses AI-enabled cameras at Goa's border entry points to monitor vehicles. These cameras can identify vehicles without valid documents, enabling authorities to issue challans. The system aims to improve enforcement and compliance at border checkposts.

Major AI Developments.title: AI traffic signals with smart cameras at 92 locations in Goa
Major AI Developments.summary: Goa has implemented AI-powered traffic signals with smart cameras at 92 locations. The intelligent system aims to improve traffic management and reduce congestion. The technology is expected to enhance road safety and efficiency in the region.
